About HEART

HEART (Health Equity Advocacy Response Team) is a student-led organization dedicated to advancing health equity by addressing systemic, social, and economic barriers that prevent individuals and communities from achieving optimal health.

Our Mission

To advocate, educate, and act in response to health inequities by empowering communities, supporting evidence-based initiatives, and fostering inclusive healthcare systems.

Our Vision

A world where every individual—regardless of background, identity, or socioeconomic status—has equal opportunity to achieve optimal health.

What We Do

  • Advocacy: Raise awareness and support equity-focused policies
  • Community Engagement: Volunteer and partner with local organizations
  • Education: Share evidence-based health resources
  • Research & Awareness: Highlight inequities through data and storytelling
